scripts.clearAllure: if [ -d allure-results ]; then rm -Rf allure-results; fi && if [ -d allure-report ]; then rm -Rf allure-report; fi
scripts.test: npm run clearAllure && npx wdio config/wdio.androiddevice.conf.js
scripts.accountTest: npm run clearAllure && npx wdio config/wdio.androiddevice.conf.js --suite account
scripts.otherFeaturesTest: npm run clearAllure && npx wdio config/wdio.androiddevice.conf.js --suite othersFeatures
scripts.bsTest: npm run clearAllure && npx wdio config/wdio.bs.conf.js --suite landing
